scripts.build: node scripts/game-loader.js build && node scripts/optimize-images.js && node scripts/optimize-audio.js
scripts.build:garden: node scripts/game-loader.js build garden && node scripts/optimize-images.js && node scripts/optimize-audio.js
scripts.vercel-build: node scripts/game-loader.js build garden && node scripts/optimize-images.js && node scripts/optimize-audio.js
scripts.analyze: ANALYZE=true node scripts/game-loader.js build garden && node scripts/optimize-images.js && node scripts/optimize-audio.js
scripts.analyze:dev: ANALYZE=true node scripts/game-loader.js build garden --mode development
